mapper.select: select distinct task_id from t_task_script where image_name like '%${related}%'

order by num desc

select count(task_id) as c from t_task_collaborativescript where task_id=#{taskId};

select * ,task_count/alltask_count as related_task from (select * from t_task as task, (select task_id,count(task_id) as alltask_count from t_task_script group by task_id) as script where task.id=script.task_id) as t, (select task_id,count(task_id) as task_count from (select distinct * from t_item_title as item_title where item in (select id from t_item where disabled="0" AND author_id in(select id from t_users where pc_email=#{usermail}))) as item,t_task_script as script where item.content=script.image_name group by task_id) as y where t.task_id=y.task_id order by related_task desc

select * from t_task_script where task_id=#{taskid} and not num in (select num from (select distinct *,id as system from t_item_title as item_title where item in (select id from t_item where disabled="0" AND author_id in(select id from t_users where pc_email=#{usermail}))) as item,t_task_script as script where item.content=script.image_name and task_id=#{taskid} order by task_id,num asc) group by image_name order by num asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_task_collaborativescript (id, lat, lng, num, script, zoom, image, task_id, image_name) VALUES (#{id}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{num}, #{script}, #{zoom}, #{image}, #{task_id}, #{image_name})
